title: Episode #1.1
description: Joris has been so busy doing the housekeeping that neighborly Trees decides to buy him a terrible looking new sweater. Just then Hanna brings home minister Ed Nijpels.

title: Episode #1.2
description: Daughter Monique, who is living in the States keeps neighbor Trees better informed than her parents. Hanna has invited Ria Beckers for tea while Mr. Boulhouwer keeps dropping by to complain.

title: Episode #1.3
description: When Hassan sneaks into the house at night Joris thinks he's being burgled. Coincidentally, Hanna has booked an ex-delinquent to give a lecture at school and asks Joris to pick him up.

title: Episode #1.4
description: Trees is being courted by an old flame. Joris tries to interview Mies Bouwman for a magazine but keeps being interrupted.

title: Episode #1.5
description: Joris asks Paul van Vliet to perform at the school charity, only to find out he won't be allowed to do his famous juggling act himself. A man offers to paint the house if Joris teaches his son at home.

title: Episode #1.6
description: Hassans father is coming to visit from Marroco. But Joris picks up the wrong man at the airport.

title: Episode #1.7
description: Writer and artist Jan Wolkers is staying in the spare room and decides on a whim to decorate one of the walls with cow manure for Hanna's birthday.

title: Episode #1.8
description: When both Trees and Hanna are taken ill, Joris has to care for both of them. He goes to a reading to meet Hanna's lookalike, actress Anne-Will Blankers.

title: Jij doet alleen de leuke dingen
description: People doing a puzzle-drive keep asking what the sign with 'Prettig Geregeld' means. Hanna catches her students cheating during an exam Joris ends up tutoring a grown up Mavo student.

title: Dat gezicht heb ik al jaren
description: Football trainer Barry Hughes is a guest speaker at Hanna's class. Joris has gotten him to coach his local football team as well.

title: Reken maar dat ik ze in de gaten hou
description: Trees is being examined in the hospital. Hassan keeps visiting, but for pretty nurse Franka instead of Trees.

title: Je moet er geweest zijn
description: Hanna is reprimanded when the school paper publishes a critical article about one of the teachers. Joris turns out to have helped the in writing the article.

title: Zoiets doen mijn dochters niet
description: It's Joris and Hanna's 25th wedding anniversary and both of them, as well as Trees are planning separate celebrations. Trees' plan includes getting daughters Monique and Yvette to come over from abroad.

title: Ben jij zo slank geweest?
description: Joris and Hanna's daughters Yvette & Monique are back home for a few days. When Hanna sprains her ankle, Joris is tasked to fill in for her at school. Both of them set their sights on a job as a school dean.

title: Wordt er nog aan het milieu gedacht?
description: Trees' driving license has expired and now it looks like she has to take her exam all over again. Hassan is collecting second hand stuff for his friend to fix and take to Marocco.

title: Wat moet ik met een Juboknuf?
description: Joris has bought an illegal wireless telephone. Trees comes over to talk about the 65th anniversary of the NCRV, and takes Hanna on a tour of the TV studios.

title: Je bent toch maar klaar als je beroemd bent
description: Trees has asked her famous nephew Jaap van Zweden to play at her birthday party which is naturally to be held at the Huisman residence.

title: Je hebt 't of je hebt 't niet
description: Hanna brings home her colleague Astrid after a late night at school. But Joris has gone out with his old school buddy Bas.

title: Hebben mannen dat tegenwoordig ook al?
description: Joris is having a mid-life crisis, so Trees & Yvette take him shopping. Hanna is busy making a video for a fellow teacher who is retiring.

title: Dat kost je je huwelijk
description: Hassan's friend Yusuf asks Joris to look after his goat while he's on holiday. He calls her Scheherazade and decides to start eating only home grown food from now on.

title: En wat dacht je van de jongere ouderen?
description: Hanna plays golf with Astrid and her new, older boyfriend Klaas-Jan and tries to get Joris to join them.

title: Hij kan 't wel, maar hij wil 't niet
description: Joris accepts a tutoring job when the boy's father offers a large no cure no pay reward. Yvette wants to try her luck as a model, which Hanna sees as an excuse not to look for a legitimate job.

title: Hoe meer vreugd, hoe meer zielen
description: Hassan asks Joris if he can invite some of his Marrocan friends to his Dutch lessons. Before he knows it, he's got a full class of 12 men. Soon the neighbors are complaining about all the cars blocking the street.

title: Jullie kerels hebben geen idee...
description: Joris is so busy teaching Hassans friends that he hires a help in the household called Alie.

title: Kom maar hoor...
description: Hanna tells Joris to give one of his trousers to Teunis, the local traffic controlling vagabond. But when he accidentally drives over the man's foot, he ends up taking Teunis home.

title: De beuk erin
description: Neighbor Lodewijk van de Plas wants to get rid of a tree in his garden, but Joris objects. Molly has moved into Trees' house and Hanna wants to buy her dream bungalow.

title: Voor de dieren van alle gezindten
description: Hanna has to take over Dutch lessons from an overworked teacher. Cousin Molly has asked her to collect for the animals, but Joris does not bite.

title: Zeg dan ook eens nee
description: Hanna is getting overworked filling in for Sietse while overseeing the school merging. Joris does his best to get her to join him in a relaxing activity but ends up going to the sauna with Margriet.

title: De tv ziet zwart van blanken
description: Hassan is asked to appear in a commercial for alcohol free beer, and decides to start his own Maroccan casting bureau 'Prettig Geregeld'.

title: Laat los, laat los jij
description: Hassan persuades Joris to take over his answering machine. Hanna cannot object as she's lost her voice. Old Mr. Van Dam proposes Molly take a self defense course for women.

title: Kunst met peren
description: Yvette has posed for Maribelle magazine in bikini, as well as her rather suspicious Belgian boyfriend Boris. He takes an interest in the painting Hanna inherited from her auntie Jo.

title: Inval der noormannen
description: Joris is asked to buy a first edition of Eric de Noorman: Het Water des Levens for a birthday and bumps into an old childhood friend Dickie Noorman. Dickie invites Joris to join his viking reenacting club.

title: Rollenspel
description: Hanna is practicing for a school play with help from Joris. He is asked to be the prompter. But when Sietse Brandsma falls ill, Joris is asked to fill in on stage.

title: Hanna 50!
description: When Hanna announces she only wants to invite women for her 50th birthday, Joris immediately calls up all their husbands to get even.
